username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

portgroup_name.description: The name of the portgroup for the VMK interface

vland_id.description: The VLAN ID for the VMK interface

enable_vmotion.description: Enable the VMK interface for vMotion traffic

subnet_mask.description: The Subnet Mask for the VMK interface

vswitch_name.description: The name of the vswitch where to add the VMK interface

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

mtu.description: The MTU for the VMK interface

enable_mgmt.description: Enable the VMK interface for Management traffic

enable_vsan.description: Enable the VMK interface for VSAN traffic

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

ip_address.description: The IP Address for the VMK interface

enable_ft.description: Enable the VMK interface for Fault Tolerance traffic
